entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:36 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:36 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
